metadata.title: CVE-2023-0051 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1144.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.note: ccdm94> the vulnerable code seems to have been introduced by commit a97c36310f (vim version 8.2.3006), as a fix for issue #8388.

criterions.comment: vim package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2').
